resources.string:
Selecting the parameters for each actor: 
voice: for each actor you must select one of the available voices 
pitch: deep:low value. high-pitched:high value 
speed: slow:low value. fast:high value
 
note: The files corresponding to the fragments of the play for each actor and the file of the complete play must be saved in a accessible folder, example: 'Downloads/Apuntador'
 
The file name must have the following format: 
- play_name-actor_name-99.txt 
(the fragment_sequence_number: from 01 to 99 for each actor)
 
The format of each file (fragments for each actor) is: 
- Actor's text: Actor_name: (name followed by : and space) Below is the text on a single line. It may contain, in parentheses, elements of narrative context. 
- Narrator's text and situation: Any text that does not begin with an actor's name followed by a colon (:)
I have not been able to read the file %s
